name: Statuspage
description: This app is an Atlassian product that is used to help monitor and communicate status issues for various products

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using the supplied credentials

query.description: Provide text to search in the incident name, status, postmortem body and incident_updates fields

limit.description: The maximum number of rows to return per page (default and max: 100)

email.description: Email address for creating email subscriber

phone_number.description: Phone number for creating SMS subscriber

skip_confirmation_notification.description: If true, the subscriber does not receive any notifications when their subscription changes

impact_override.description: Select value to override calculated impact value

body.description: Write a initial message, created as the first incident update

component_ids.description: Specify component's id affected by this incident. Separate multiple ids with commas

components.description: A JSON object of 'component affected' and 'status'

output.example_value: We are currently investigating this issue
We are currently investigating this issue.

actions.description: Get a list of incident subscribers
